titleStmt.title: The opinion of the Parliament, about religion, twenty years ago being the votes, &c. of the honourable House of Commons, Febr. 25 &c. 1662 upon reading His Majesties gracious declaration and speech, &c.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
